__e: I must've watched it a hundred times when I was trying to find you.
And Mr. Little, you had seen him many times before, had you not?
I've seen him thousands of times.
I've now done it many, many times.
He did call a couple of times.
He's done it many times before.
I don't know, like I was in another universe all of a sudden...
I wish I could do more because I can't help, but remember all the times that I could.
All those times in history when there's no sign of him,
And you should, for those times I let you down. But it doesn't mean I didn't care.
Oh, the Iast few times I was here I really enjoyed it.
I want you to know, all the times I imagined you being here, it was not like this.
The marks on your arms, they're from another life.
Sir, what are those marks on your arm?
What are those marks on him?
But... ever since you were a little girl... I've thought about your wedding.
Do you have any idea how many times I'd wondered if we'd ever make it to this day?
I have thought about you many, many times... wondering what you would say to so young a mother.
